synopsis.text:
When the festive spirit of Christmas descends upon the town, the young couple Yuuta Togashi and Rikka Takanashi find themselves in the midst of a romantic conundrum. As they navigate the early stages of their relationship, both are hesitant to make the first move, hindered by their own bashfulness. Seeking guidance, Rikka turns to her class representative, Shinka Nibutani, who suggests utilizing the magical atmosphere of Christmas to foster a deeper connection with Yuuta.

Inspired by Yuuta's friend, Makoto Isshiki, the group decides to host a Christmas party at the luxurious residence of Sanae Dekomori. As the festivities unfold, Yuuta realizes that Rikka has mysteriously vanished from the gathering. His search for her leads him to an unexpected discovery: Rikka and Sanae have indulged in a bit too much holiday cheer and are now inebriated!

Set after the events of "Chuunibyou demo Koi ga Shitai!", this OVA episode invites viewers to join the couple and their friends as they celebrate the holiday season and explore the intricacies of young love. As Yuuta and Rikka's relationship unfolds amidst the backdrop of a lively Christmas party, one can only wonder how the night will end for this blossoming romance.
